text:
"There is a desperate hope in the industry that if you adopt containers you'll adopt DevOps. "No wait, containers won't make me DevOps, but #Kubernetes... now that will make me magically DevOps...." Not quite,."

@holly_cummins @DOES_EUR #IBMGarage #DOES19
